div.div: Case Western Reserve vs. College of Wooster
at Wooster, Ohio | John P. Papp Stadium

tr.td: Case wins the toss, defers to the second half.
Daniel Vasil kickoff 52 yards to the WOO18, Ogletree-Crawfo return 14 yards to the WOO32 (Matthew Davis).
Brett Frongillo pass complete to Zack Weidrick for 10 yards to the WOO42, 1ST DOWN WOO (Cary Dieter;Ryan Ferguson).
